price: Пас, [Мӯсо] асои худро андохт, ногаҳон [табдил ба] аждаҳое ошкор шуд
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
